lexUnit.name: persuade.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: cause to do something through reasoning or argument.

sentence.text: An unknown peasant girl from Lorraine , Joan of Arc , persuaded the dauphin that she had been sent by God to raise the siege .
